page.title: 15PASTIMES
page.content: People in the Mosstowie area do not need to go very far afield for their pastimes because the amenities are good.Gardening,cycling and playing the piano are the most popular hobbies and sewing,knitting and cooking are also enjoyed.During the winter months many people go to rural and guild meetings. Most people in this area prefer living in the country.The people that liked cycling would put their point of view as"I think that living in the country helps a lot because it is more enjoyable cycling in the peace and quiet of the country".The advantage of the country for gardeners is that their gardens are bigger and better.
